trans-unit.source: Yordle allows you to shorten URLs so that they are easier to share with people. For example, the following URL https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dQw4w9WgXcQ can be shortened to ${document.baseURI}PmYUlTPea, which can be shared more easily.
trans-unit.target: Yordle能帮助您生成一个短网址以方便您与他人分享。例如以下这个复杂的网址： https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dQw4w9WgXcQ 就可以轻易被缩短为 ${document.baseURI}PmYUlTPea。这样的短网址在即时通信工具以及社交网络都更容易分享以及被记忆。

trans-unit.source: How do I shorten a link?
trans-unit.target: 我怎样才能缩短一个网址？

trans-unit.source:
To shorten a link, paste in the long URL in the text box labeled 'Your original URL here', then click on the 'Shorten URL' button.

A new dialog box will show up with the shortened URL. Click on the 'Copy' button to copy it to your clipboard so that it can be shared, emailed or tweeted.
trans-unit.target:
要想缩短一个长链接，请在标注了“请填入您的链接地址”的输入框住填入您原本的链接地址，然后点击“缩短网址”按钮。

一个带有短网址的新的对话框将会出现。点击“复制”按钮，可以自动把这个短网址复制到您的剪贴板，以方便您在邮件，即时通信工具，以及社交网络上分享。

source.ph: <mwc-textfield outlined="" id="input" label="Your original URL here" type="url" error-message="URL invalid"> </mwc-textfield>

target.ph: <mwc-textfield outlined="" id="input" label="请填入您的链接地址" type="url" error-message="链接地址不合法"> </mwc-textfield>

trans-unit.source: Shorten your URL so its ready to be shared everywhere
trans-unit.target: 缩短您的链接地址以便可以在任何场合使用

trans-unit.source: Analytics help you know where your clicks are coming from
trans-unit.target: 数据分析帮您了解您的用户来自何处
具体跟踪了解您的用户

source.ph: <mwc-snackbar id="snackbar" leading="" closeonescape="" timeoutms="5000" labeltext="Short URL copied to clipboard"></mwc-snackbar>
